text: María Victoria Cervantes Cervantes (born 26 February 1927), more commonly known simply as María Victoria, is a Mexican actress, singer, and comedian. She is best known for starring as Inocencia in the Telesistema Mexicano sitcom La criada bien criada and its 1972 spin-off movie. She was born in Guadalajara, Jalisco. Her career began in 1951. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican singers Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican comedians Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Actors from Guadalajara
title: María Victoria
